description:
My Udemy Courses have been taken by over 5000 people from 135 countries. They have received consistent high ratings throughout Udemy.

The Complete LinkedIn B2B Marketing Course is designed for Marketing, Digital Agency professionals and entrepreneurs seeking to learn and transform your B2B marketing performance using LinkedIn.

You will learn how to use and apply the full range of tools, applications and hidden techniques by watching clear detailed instruction video demonstrations designed for easy digestion. The curriculum is structured in a logical, sequential order making it easy to follow and implement seamlessly into your working day.

Note: This course is updated regularly with new lectures and downloadable pdfs.

What does this Marketing Course offer that others don't:
How to apply multiple techniques to compound marketing impact
Explanation and clear guidance on new marketing opportunities such as the updated Campaign Manager, Sponsored Inmails, Lead Accelerator and Elevate
Optimising the full value of content marketing apps including Pulse, Slideshare and Company pages
Expected return on investment using all LinkedIn advertising options including Onsite and Network display, Sponsored updates, Sponsored Inmail and lead accelerator
Comprehensive ongoing LinkedIn learning and resources for all levels

The course duration is a 2 hours 45 minutes for completion of all 28 Videos
title: The Complete LinkedIn B2B Marketing Course
